snippet.title: After the Fall - E3 Announcement Teaser [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Register for a chance at beta access: http://afterthefall-vr.com

From the creators of the hit VR shooter Arizona Sunshine comes an epic VR action FPS with seamless co-op gameplay at its core that pits up to four players against a vast, hostile world in a raging fight for survival. Coming to VR in 2020.

Wishlist now:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/751630/After_the_Fall/
Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2417599994919704/
